description: Humorous take on feeling 'dyed' after ingesting food coloring
title: Colorful Guts
n_1: Sam accidentally swallows food coloring while baking.
n_2: Feeling odd, Sam decides to visit the doctor.
c1_2: I feel weird, like I've changed.
n_3: Doctor performs a check-up and reassures Sam.
c1_3: Am I going to be okay?
c2_3: You're fine, just a bit colorful inside!
n_4: Sam processes the news with humor.
c1_4: I guess I’ve dyed a little inside!
c2_4: That's one way to add color to your life!
